评论详情: ... which leads me to question their UV efficacy, too. My previous sunnies were authentic RayBan aviators and there was no question they were polarized as it took me awhile to get used to how different certain things looked, as viewed through polarized lenses. Once I took them off from wearing the first time, which wasn't a very sunny day at all, my eyes still felt like I'd been out with bare nekkid eyeballs instead of alleged UV400 protected eyes. •Are they cute? Yes. •Are they lightweight? Ultra! •Are they comfortable? Even with a sinus migraine •Are they truly UV400 & polarized for eye protection? I have zero confidence answering either way. •Are they going to be durable? If you're like me, a dropper who somehow manages to kick the sunglasses - lens down - across the asphalt, when you bend down to pick them up... 类型: Color: Pink Frame/ Pink Mirror Lens
评论详情: I just bought a pair of Ray Bans but wanted these to use at the beach, and places I might damage my expensive Ray Bans. These are exact duplicate aside from the Ray Ban logo.  I now have three pairs of these, the black, blue mirrored and pink mirrored.  My only complaint is that my favorite would have been the pink.  The outside is really beautiful pink, just gorgeous, but the inside lens you look through makes everything this kind of unnatural bright green/blue. I hope this manufacturer changes this and uses the same lens that is used in the blue mirrored pair as those have great lens.  I am not sure if I just got a funky pair bc the blue mirrored lens is great a very natural color sort of like how you would see through an amber lens.  Black also has a very natural color to see the world through.  All three lens are very clear tho and not distorted like many cheaper glasses are.  I highly recommend these.  In a way I wish I never got my expensive Ray Bans if I knew of these lol.  These are also packaged better with a case, a soft cloth case also, and a cleaning cloth, and a cardboard thing to show they actually are polarized.  You can't beat these.
